description: Try our easy to follow Dark Chocolate Fondue recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Dark Chocolate Fondue Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop good-quality dark chocolate. Place it into a medium heavy-based saucepan, with whipping cream, unsalted butter, caster sugar, and a pinch of salt.
Heat the mixture slowly over a medium heat, stirring constantly, until the chocolate has melted and the mixture is smooth, glossy, and warm.
Transfer to a fondue set to keep warm, or serve immediately in a bowl with dippers alongside.
